about_the_game:
AUTOGUN HEROES GOES SUPERCHARGED

Aliens have taken over the galaxy, and it is your mission to take it back. You start off with Gus, a classic action hero, and your job is to rescue his fellow heroes one by one, who are captured and held on alien-infested planets. By rescuing heroes, you gain a better chance at fighting the galaxy's alien infestation. Autogun Heroes: Supercharged is a thrilling shoot-'em-up that delivers skill-based 2D action platforming with tight, responsive controls. Assemble your heroes, each wielding distinct abilities, and reclaim your home one battle at a time!

CHOOSE YOUR PLAYSTYLE, CHOOSE YOUR HERO

Each of the crazy heroes are equipped with unique abilities, ranging from increased fire rates to jetpacks. Try different heroes and choose your favorite strategically to match your own playstyle. To complement your heroes' strengths and cover their weaknesses, you can further optimize their performance with weapons, gadgets, and armor to customize stats like damage, fire rate, and defense to adapt to the relentless challenges of the alien-infected galaxy.

OPTIMIZE WITH WEAPONS, ARMOUR AND EQUIPMENT

Choose weapons, gadgets, and armor that enhance each character’s unique stats, to maximize their potential against the aliens. The best loadouts depend on how you play—experiment to find the ideal combination that complements your strategy and adapts seamlessly to the challenges ahead.

WISHLIST NOW!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.8 GHz Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 650, Radeon R7 370 or equivalent with 2 GB of video RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
  • Additional Notes: A keyboard, mouse, or controller is required for gameplay.

short_description: Blast your way through alien-infested planets and help Gus rescue powerful heroes, one by one, to save the galaxy. This challenging 2D action platformer combines intense shoot-'em-up chaos with smooth, responsive controls. Dodge. Roll. Dominate!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Turkish, Spanish - Latin America
